info.name: Cursor - Black - KMV
info.description:
Black Cursors.

-Global.

Includes Pointer and Clicker (:hover + :active) - all base64 (non-url).

Code is provided to the Public Domain.
Feel free to copy, - (re-)distribute, edit &/or include it in your own Themes without asking.

Stylus recommended:
https://add0n.com/stylus.html


For Black cursor without pointers;
https://userstyles.org/styles/185630/


For use in OS:
https://archive.org/details/KMV-Resources
.cur located in .zip


The rest of my themes:
https://userstyles.org/users/370722/

Contact:
https://old.reddit.com/r/KMV/
info.additionalInfo:
20191002 Added Link Pointer
20191002 Implemented versatility of cursors, including new Click-Cursor.
20191009 Added more hovers
20191011 Added :hovers
20191014 Added :hovers
20191015 Removed "li a *" from :hovers. Adjusted code to accommodate for "input" and forced native main cursors on "ul"
20191022 Added a pointer:hover (.pointer)
20191110 Changed Description for Chrome users. Removed false pointer element.
20191129 Added :hovers to Archive.org and Stylus
20191228 Added general pointer "button" property (id)
20191229 Added :hover + :active on volume sliders and menu button on userstyles.org. Added "div" to forceful list to override unwanted custom pointers.
20200128 Added general pointer+active "close" class+id.
20200201 Pointers added
20200423 Button Pointers added
20200509 Broader compatibility with hovers
20200513 More pointers and clickers added
20200625 Added new Cursor Only Theme to description
20200708 Changed name and description
20200709 Added pointers and clickers to RES Menu (Reddit).
20200710 Added pointers and clickers to Reddit
20200718 Fullscreen cursor hide integrated on some main sites; YouTube, Vimeo, Archive.org and JW-Players. More to come in the future updates.
20200721 Fixes after update. More to follow.
20200723 Update of description and cursors.
20200803 Update of pointers.
20200805 Added a pointer to YT following the recent update (new Menu Bar).
20200821 Tweaked cursors in general volume sliders, and integrated Vimeo. Added a new pointer to Duckduckgo.
20201020 General update of pointers.
20201119 Update of pointers.

style.css:
/*
/*
/* i really want this to be global */
/* 
/* Cursor - Black - KMV
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/175086/
/*
/* Black Cursor only (no pointers):
/* https://userstyles.org/styles/185630/
/*
/* =============================
/* Code is in the Public domain.
/* Do with it what thou wilt.
/* =============================
/*
/* Stylus recommended:
/* https://add0n.com/stylus.html
/*
/* Other Themes by KMV:
/* https://userstyles.org/users/370722
/*
/* Contact:
/* https://www.reddit.com/r/KMV/
/*
*/

/* Main Cursor */

html,
body,
#main-content *
{
  cursor: url("data:image/x-icon;base64,"), default;
}

.fzTkuBRFT8iIn1XnJX_Yn path,.fzTkuBRFT8iIn1XnJX_Yn svg
{
  cursor: url("data:image/x-icon;base64,"), default !important;
}


/*Experimental*/

::select,
::selection
{
  cursor: text !important;
}


/*Fullscreen Cursor Hide*/

body.navia :-moz-full-screen,
[class*="fullscreen"] [class*="inactive"],
[class*="fullscreen"][class*="inactive"],
[class*="inactive"],
.jw-flag-fullscreen.jw-flag-user-inactive div.jw-wrapper.jw-reset div.jw-media.jw-reset video.jw-video.jw-reset,
.player.player-cursor-hide,
[style="cursor: none"],
.reddit-video-player-root::after,
.ytp-autohide
{
    cursor: none!important;
}
